description:
Desire Blue Ocean EDT for Men - A Refreshing Aquatic Adventure

Dive into the invigorating depths of Desire Blue Ocean EDT, a captivating aquatic fragrance designed for the modern man who embraces adventure and freedom. This 150ml eau de toilette captures the essence of the boundless ocean, delivering a refreshing blend that awakens the senses and ignites the spirit. ‚ú®

Product Information

Size Gender Product Type Concentration Brand
150ml Men Eau de Toilette Medium Desire

The Ocean-Inspired Fragrance Profile

Top Notes Heart Notes Base Notes
Bergamot, Marine Accord, Lemon Lavender, Geranium, Aquatic Notes Amber, Cedar, Musk

Key Features of Desire Blue Ocean

  • üåä Fresh aquatic scent perfect for daily wear
  • üçã Vibrant citrus opening that energizes the senses
  • üåø Balanced with aromatic lavender and geranium
  • üî• Long-lasting formula that evolves throughout the day
  • üíé Elegant blue bottle design representing the ocean depths
  • ‚ú® Versatile fragrance suitable for office and casual occasions

The Desire Blue Ocean collection emerged as a celebration of the untamed power and serene beauty of the ocean. Inspired by the vast blue waters that cover our planet, this bestselling fragrance embodies the freedom and adventure that comes with exploring uncharted territories. The sleek blue bottle design mirrors the deep ocean waters, making it a stylish addition to any men's fragrance collection.

Experience the Blue Ocean Difference

What sets Desire Blue Ocean EDT apart is its perfect balance of freshness and masculinity. The opening notes of bergamot and marine accord create an immediate sense of freshness, while the heart notes of lavender and geranium add a sophisticated aromatic dimension. As the fragrance settles, the base notes of amber, cedar, and musk provide a warm, enduring foundation that's both comforting and distinctly masculine. This marine-inspired fragrance is perfect for the man who appreciates refined simplicity with a touch of adventure.

Frequently Asked Question

How long does Desire Blue Ocean EDT last on skin?

Desire Blue Ocean EDT offers impressive longevity for an aquatic fragrance, typically lasting 6-8 hours on skin. For maximum longevity, apply to pulse points after showering when skin is still slightly damp. The fragrance projection is moderate, making it suitable for professional environments while still maintaining a noticeable presence. The cedar and musk base notes help anchor the scent, allowing the refreshing aquatic character to remain consistent throughout its wear time.
short_description: Desire Blue Ocean EDT captures the essence of the boundless ocean in a refreshing 150ml fragrance for men. With invigorating marine accords, citrus brightness, and a masculine woody base, this aquatic scent offers freedom and confidence for everyday adventures.
